rows: Solve Creatiowide problems not related to a specific app

Available for a wide range of tasks that do not belong to other specialized agents. It lets you work with text, create new meetings, perform data searches in the system, and gather insights based on account and contact scoring results.
Create Chart, Gauge, Dougnut, and Metric type widgets as well as dashboards

Streamlines dashboard creation by making Chart, Gauge, Doughnut, or Metric type widgets based on your input, then displaying them in the chat. You can add widgets only to environment dashboards, i.e., dashboards that cannot be transferred between environments.
Productivity. Avalible out of the box in Sales and Creatio Service products. For other products, the app must be purchased separately from the Marketplace.
Boosts efficiency by automating routine communication tasks and meeting planning. It assists in managing emails, scheduling meetings, identifying contacts, and summarizing email threads.
Lead and Opportunity Management, Order and Contract Management
Assists with all routine sales tasks like account data enrichment, data population in opportunity after zoom meetings, lead and opportunity summarization, and new meeting preparation.
Helps you create, edit, and structure brand-consistent, data-driven marketing emails tailored to email goals and audience segments.
Solve cases and track case analytics

Supports in understanding and resolving customer issues quickly by providing relevant insights, resolution suggestions, and performance analysis. In addition to streamlining service agent workflows, it is also valuable for customer success managers and account managers who need quick overviews of open or overdue cases, historical context, and case summaries to stay informed and proactive.
Create knowledge base articles based on cases

Accelerates knowledge base growth by analyzing resolved cases and drafting relevant knowledge articles. It supports continuous improvement in service quality and ensures valuable information is captured and shared across the organization.
Create dynamic folders from natural-language queries

Helps users and AI agents turn plain-language requests into dynamic folders that reflect the intended audience or data set. The agent interprets intent and applies it consistently across the system to produce accurate, reusable filters without manual configuration.
Assist users with email deliverability-related questions, guidance, and issue resolution
Focuses on assisting users with matters related to email delivery, inbox placement, and compliance with global email standards.
Create precise audience segments from natural-language descriptions
Lead Generation, Event Management, Email Marketing, Digital Ads

Helps marketers turn plain-language audience descriptions into accurate, dynamic segments. The agent understands marketing intent, generates the correct filters, and automatically creates dynamic folders in Creatio Marketing, removing manual setup while keeping segments reusable and up to date. The agent can also offer practical recommendations and best practices for audience segmentation, helping teams create clearer and more actionable segments.

Name

Description

Apps

Benefits and use cases

Version

Creatio.ai Agent

Solve Creatiowide problems not related to a specific app

Studio

Available for a wide range of tasks that do not belong to other specialized agents. It lets you work with text, create new meetings, perform data searches in the system, and gather insights based on account and contact scoring results.

8.3 Twin and later

Analytics Agent

Create Chart, Gauge, Dougnut, and Metric type widgets as well as dashboards

Studio

Streamlines dashboard creation by making Chart, Gauge, Doughnut, or Metric type widgets based on your input, then displaying them in the chat. You can add widgets only to environment dashboards, i.e., dashboards that cannot be transferred between environments.

8.3.1 Twin and later

Productivity Agent

Improve communication and meetings

Productivity. Avalible out of the box in Sales and Creatio Service products. For other products, the app must be purchased separately from the Marketplace.

Boosts efficiency by automating routine communication tasks and meeting planning. It assists in managing emails, scheduling meetings, identifying contacts, and summarizing email threads.

8.3 Twin and later

Sales Agent

Automate sales-related actions

Lead and Opportunity Management, Order and Contract Management

Assists with all routine sales tasks like account data enrichment, data population in opportunity after zoom meetings, lead and opportunity summarization, and new meeting preparation.

8.3 Twin and later

Email Generation Agent

Manage emails

Email Marketing

Helps you create, edit, and structure brand-consistent, data-driven marketing emails tailored to email goals and audience segments.

8.3 Twin and later

Case Resolution Agent

Solve cases and track case analytics

Case Management

Supports in understanding and resolving customer issues quickly by providing relevant insights, resolution suggestions, and performance analysis. In addition to streamlining service agent workflows, it is also valuable for customer success managers and account managers who need quick overviews of open or overdue cases, historical context, and case summaries to stay informed and proactive.

8.3 Twin and later

Knowledge Agent

Create knowledge base articles based on cases

Knowledge Management

Accelerates knowledge base growth by analyzing resolved cases and drafting relevant knowledge articles. It supports continuous improvement in service quality and ensures valuable information is captured and shared across the organization.

8.3 Twin and later

Filter Agent

Create dynamic folders from natural-language queries

Studio

Helps users and AI agents turn plain-language requests into dynamic folders that reflect the intended audience or data set. The agent interprets intent and applies it consistently across the system to produce accurate, reusable filters without manual configuration.

8.3.2 Twin and later

Deliverability Agent

Assist users with email deliverability-related questions, guidance, and issue resolution

Email Marketing

Focuses on assisting users with matters related to email delivery, inbox placement, and compliance with global email standards.

8.3.2 Twin and later

Segmentation Agent

Create precise audience segments from natural-language descriptions

Lead Generation, Event Management, Email Marketing, Digital Ads

Helps marketers turn plain-language audience descriptions into accurate, dynamic segments. The agent understands marketing intent, generates the correct filters, and automatically creates dynamic folders in Creatio Marketing, removing manual setup while keeping segments reusable and up to date. The agent can also offer practical recommendations and best practices for audience segmentation, helping teams create clearer and more actionable segments.

8.3.2 Twin and later
